executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Focus on UX testing for the new features: 1) MiniCalendar scrollable wheel with smooth snap-to-center behavior, test scroll detection and green circle transitions. 2) RecipeCard hover effects, floating animation, and shadow elevations. 3) Verify smooth transitions (500ms) work correctly. 4) Check that calendar auto-centers on click and maintains selected state. 5) Test recipe card image centering and proper display without white spaces.
